summary.Title: Houseman in a sustainable hotel chain in Copenhagen
summary.JobHeadline: Houseman in a sustainable hotel chain in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation:
Houseman day and/or night
Scandclean is looking for a dedicated colleague for the Housekeeping department in a sustainably-run hotel in Copenhagen.
You must be a team

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Houseman in a sustainable hotel chain in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Houseman day and/or night

Scandclean is looking for a dedicated colleague for the Housekeeping department in a sustainably-run hotel in Copenhagen.

You must be a team player and have passion for delivering a high quality service in a complex environment.

Job Overview

This position involves the following responsibilities in the housekeeping department:

  • Cleaning public hotel areas as well as staff areas
  • Maintain cleanliness and organization of depots
  • Laundry management
  • Trash management
  • Provide 5-star guest service
  • Room service duties

Requirements

We expect from you, that you are:

  • Independent, but still a team player
  • Positive and stable
  • Effective, efficient and energetic
  • Careful and paying attention to details
  • Have technical flair
  • Able to prepare snacks
  • Flexible and able to keep the overview during busy periods
  • Service minded both to guests and colleagues
  • Basic english level
  • Valid work permit for Denmark

You are, by nature, positive and see solutions and welcome a challenge. You understand how to maintain a high professional level and are proud of your profession.

We offer an attractive package with a good salary and pension incl. health package, social events and organic lunch. The position is min. 15-20 hours per week, the day shifts are between 7:00-16:00 and the night shifts are mainly between 22.00-06.00.

We regularly invite candidates for interviews, so send your application and resume as soon as possible to info@scandclean.dk 

Scandclean is a Copenhagen-based cleaning company that operates solely in Guldsmeden Hotels.
